com.Clerver.domain.mediator

Interface ModelInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClientModelManager, Proxy, ServerModelManager

    public interface ModelInterface
    This interface is a bit tricky to explain, may need to read over a few times.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • login

        Profile login(java.lang.String username,
              java.lang.String password)
        Method login, FROM CLIENT: Accepts user input of username and password and creates a buffered profile which is being sent to the server. FROM SERVER: Accepts a client transmitted profile object and checks if it exists in the Server. If true it returns the whole profile information, if not it returns null. NOTE: returning null is a bad thing, needs a fix.

      • createAProfile

        boolean createAProfile(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        Method createAprofile, registraion in short. FROM CLIENT: Accepts user input of username and password and creates a buffered profile which is being sent to the server. FROM SERVER: Accepts a client transmitted profile object and checks if it exists, if true it returns false to the client, which notifies the user that the profile is already taken. If false it creates a profile and the user is automatically logged in.

      • getAnEnemy

        Enemy getAnEnemy()
        The client pushes a request using the proxy, to the server. Server accept the request, generates an enemy(factory's design patter ) and sents it back to the client.

      • getAShopKeeper

        ShopKeeper getAShopKeeper()
        The client pushes a request using the proxy, to the server. Server accept the request, generates a Shopkeeper(Using builder's and factory's design patter ) and sents it back to the client.

      • getAnItem

        Item getAnItem()
        The client pushes a request using the proxy, to the server. Server accept the request, generates an item(Using builder's and factory's design patter ) and sents it back to the client.

      • exit

        void exit(Profile profile)
        an exit method. FROM CLIENT: Takes the profile and sends it to the server with an identificator. FROM SERVER: Takes input of the profile object plus the identificator which tells the server that the client has stopped the application and it needs to save the progress.
